languages.english-overview:
Handesk is a powerful yet simple Ticketing system, a system that allows to have multiple teams, with multiple users, easy and efficient reporting by all/team/user as well as lead management.
Handesk is licensed under the MIT.

ul.li: Multiple : teams You can handle multiple teams with just one account.
Rest API : Easy Api to integrate with your projects.
Issue tracker : You can escalate the tickets and create issues to your code issue tracker..
Email polling : Get your tickets directly from an inbox account.
Reports : See each of your team analytics.

languages.english-exp_ad_pass: New password. Leave blank if you do not want to reset the password
languages.english-err_no_email: Please provide the email to reset the password
languages.english-err_no_such_email: The Admin email is incorrect and does not exist!
languages.english-no_pass_encrypt: Could not encrypt admin password because the domain is not pointing to the correct server
